unnormalised: Campus hiring at IIT Delhi remains crucial for our entry-level talent pipeline. We've seen promising candidates, especially from CSE and Mechanical Engineering. Reminds me of 3 Idiots, where Rancho championed practical learning. The deadline for submitting applications is October 27th, 2024. CTC offered is Rs. 7,00,000 per annum. Successful candidates will be relocated to our Bangalore office, approximately 2000 km away. Best of luck to all applicants.
normalised: Campus hiring at I I T Delhi remains crucial for our entry-level talent pipeline. We've seen promising candidates, especially from C S E and Mechanical Engineering. Reminds me of Three Idiots, where Rancho championed practical learning. The deadline for submitting applications is twenty seventh October two thousand and twenty four. C T C offered is rupee seven hundred thousand per annum. Successful candidates will be relocated to our Bangalore office, approximately two thousand kilometer away. Best of luck to all applicants.
